Merry Driftmas Drifters!

Thanks for a huge year of support and drifting. To say thanks we have some cool stuff just in time for Christmas, so get sideways!

- Select your layout for practice!
- New rank and higher rank cap - LEGEND!
- Increase level cap to 60!
- Selling parts!
- Titles!
- Increased maximum purchasable paint layers!
- New driver car - Charles Ng!
- New stock car - S13!
- New stock car - BRZ!

See you on the track!

- The GMG team

Sup Drifters,

We hope you had a great holiday! This update fixes many existing issues, brings back the BRZ and S13 kit, and may improve performance for some phones.

A new update with new content and cars will be coming in the next couple of weeks, so stay tuned!

- Simplified tilt to be more like other games. You no longer need to counter steer and drifting should be smoother.
- The BRZ is back in the store!
- The S13 Bodykit has been fixed and is back in the store!
- Icons are no longer generated in the login screen, this should stop crashing during the login process.
- Fixed the chat button in events.
- Fixed custom control layouts being reset.
- Fixed the left side handbrake not working.
- Added an optional trajectory guide in control settings.
- Fixed multiple sponsor tasks.
- Fixed many many other bugs.
- You can now create multiple accounts and select account when logging in.
- Improved performance for some devices.

1.6.6
- Improved performance
- Fixed slider steering
- Various bug fixes
- Fixed tutorial issues
- Fixed some memory leaks and crashes

1.6.0
- Custom MX5 Bodykit
- Ford Focus Bodykit
- RB38DETT Engine
- Alec Hohnadell 2019 Livery
- Tournaments are back in event rotation
- Leaderboard Overhaul
- Setting screens overhaul
- Resolve a bunch of audio issues
- Fixed screenshot mode crashing
- Fixed cars rolling at start lights
- Fixed paint store decals moving slightly when selected
- Fixed getting stuck on searching
- Fixed cars wobbling in replays

- 3 New awesome female pro cars! Kelsey Rowlings (S14), Jodie Donovan (Supra with BRZ front), Miki Takagi (S13)!
- Track environment and smoke optimization, there should be slightly better performance while driving!
- Fixed multiple visual issues with the BRZ
- Game engine update. There should be slightly better performance overall.
- Custom controller mapping!
- Buttons are now pinch resizable when customizing controls!
- Fixed audio in the replay recording feature.
- Engine swapped Nerren's car to sound like a 5L instead of a 1jz.

- 4-256 player Tournament events!
- Ebisu track!
- New pro car! Chris Forsberg
- New stock cars! 180sx, 370z, Mustang, Supra, GT86
- Added titles for tournaments
- The rank leaderboard will now be wiped weekly to remove old players
- Fixed s15 performance issues and crashing
- Buying pro cars now gives the stock version of the car as a bonus
- Loads of bug fixes

- Fixed tournament scores sometimes not being recorded
- Dummy players have been removed from tournaments
- Fixed titles and leaderboards in tournaments
- Parts can now be sold again
- Private tournaments now have no wait time and are started by the creator
- Fixed bug report dialogue appearing at inconvenient times
- Fixed getting stuck on "small crate" popup
- Fixed GT86 not being paintable

Formula Drift - Long Beach Track!
New pro cars: Matt Field and Kristaps Bluss!
Stock cars: Z06, E30, E46!
Alloy painting can now be unlocked for bullion!
Matchmaking Overhaul!
"Loading opponent" optimization - should now be instant!
The HUB has been disabled to make room for upcoming integrated social features.
Fixed some issues with purchasing bullion.

Another huge new Torque Drift update with lots of new features and content to get your drift fix at home!

The Torque Drift Halloween Update is here! We've got some awesome in-game content including special limited-time Halloween crates with exclusive content!
- Drift the new night track at PÅ‚ock stadium!

- Open lobby voice chat is now here! Enable voice when creating a lobby and then turn your mic on from within the lobby panel!
- Tournaments can now be created in the Custom Lobby tab! Simply change the game mode type, pick the number of rounds and select a track!

- Fixed horn button placement
- Fixed camera not being able to be changed in replays
- Fixed lobby list not updating correctly

A brand new Update for Torque Drift is here!
We've completely rebuilt the User interface to improve usability and have introduced some new features!
